actions.text: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Ryan (OH) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A045) offered by Mr. Ryan (OH) to the Rules amendment (A001).
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ryan (OH) amendment (A045) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole

amends_amendment.description: Amendment consists of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32, as amended, and which was made in order pursuant to H. Res. 507.
amends_amendment.purpose: An amendment consisting of the text of Rules Committee print 114-32 which shall be considered as pending.

description: Amendment clarifies that alternative fuel vehicles are eligible for consideration and use of funding under the Congestion Mitigation and Air Quality (CMAQ) Improvement Program.
purpose: An amendment No. 2 printed in Part A of House Report 114-326 to clarify that alternative fuel vehicles are eligible for consideration and use of funding under the Congestion Mitigation and Air Quality (CMAQ) Improvement Program.
